The royal mistresses of France, or, The secret history of the amours of all the French kings from Pharamond the first monarch, anno 418 to this present time / made English from the French original. Galanteries des rois de France. English Vanel, M. (Claude)

Printed for Henry Rhodes ..., and John Harris ..., London : 1695.
